options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> : Lattice energy

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi></math> : Electron affinity

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math> : Decreasing order of electronegativity of <math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text:
Here the incorrect statement is option C as the correct order of Lewis acidic character: PF5>SiF4>SF6 . Although, S has vaccant 3d-orbital but it cannot accept co-ordinate bond from Lewis base due to steric crowding factor as S-atom is already bonded to six F-atoms.
Rest other statements are correct here.
